problems.title: Tower of Hanoi
problems.description: Implement the Tower of Hanoi puzzle using recursion. Move n disks from source to destination using auxiliary rod.
problems.outputFormat: Print each move in format: 'Move disk from A to C' (one move per line)

sampleTestCases.output:
Move disk from A to B
Move disk from A to C
Move disk from B to C

problems.title: Hollow Diamond Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a hollow diamond pattern.
problems.inputFormat: Single integer n (half height, must be odd)

problems.title: Hollow Hourglass Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a hollow hourglass pattern.
problems.inputFormat: Single integer n (must be odd, represents total height)

problems.title: Generate All Subsets
problems.description: Write a recursive function to generate all subsets of an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print all subsets, one per line (empty subset as empty line)

problems.title: Find Max in 2D Array Recursively
problems.description: Write a recursive function to find maximum element in a 2D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

problems.title: Sum of 3D Array Recursively
problems.description: Write a recursive function to calculate sum of all elements in a 3D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: x y z (dimensions)
Next x*y lines: z space-separated integers

problems.title: N-Queens Problem
problems.description: Solve the N-Queens problem using recursion. Print the number of solutions.

problems.title: Print 2D Array Spirally
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print 2D array elements in spiral order.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print elements in spiral order, space-separated

problems.title: Permutations of Array
problems.description: Write a recursive function to generate all permutations of an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print all permutations, one per line

problems.title: Maze Path Count
problems.description: Count all possible paths in an m x n grid from top-left to bottom-right (can only move right or down) using recursion.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers m and n (grid dimensions)
